verses.verse: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> miz-Be-ach an altar מִקְטַ֣ר <S%H4729><s%> mik-Tar to burn קְטֹ֑רֶת <S%H7004><s%> ke-To-ret; incense עֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֖ים <S%H7848><s%> shit-Tim upon [of] shittim תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.
